Tomboy.TaskManager.DateTag

Tomboy.TaskManager.DateTag Class Reference

Tag that identifies a duedate. It is responsible for listening to clicks (opening calendar dialog), but also finding the duedate later on. More...

Detailed Description

Tag that identifies a duedate. It is responsible for listening to clicks (opening calendar dialog), but also finding the duedate later on.
